item.title: US To End 540-Day Automatic Immigrant Work Permit Extension: Who's Affected?
item.description: The Trump administration is set to terminate the automatic extension of certain immigrant work permits. See who's affected. read more

item.title: Jensen Huang Says Nvidia Has Visibility Into 'Half A Trillion Dollars' In Revenue As It Surpasses Apple, Microsoft To Hit $5 Trillion Valuation
item.description: Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang revealed the chipmaker has visibility into "half a trillion dollars" in revenue, driven by soaring AI chip demand. read more

item.title: Dave Ramsey Tells Parents To Stop Giving Allowances — 'If You Don't Do The Work, You Don't Get Paid'
item.description: Dave Ramsey urges parents to replace allowances with commission system that teaches kids the value of work and money from an early age. read more

item.title: Microsoft's Backlog Surges 51% To $392 Billion: Commercial Bookings 'Significantly Ahead of Expectations,' Says CFO Amy Hood
item.description: Tech giant Microsoft Corp. had a blowout fiscal first-quarter performance, as demand for its cloud and AI services continued to accelerate. read more
